text: Waɗannan suna da gidajen Aljannar zama, ƙoramu na gudana daga ƙarƙashinsu, ana sanya musu ƙawa, a cikinsu, daga mundaye na zinariya, kuma suna tufantar waɗansu tufafi kore, na alharini raƙiƙi da alharini mai kauri suna kishingiɗe a cikinsu, a kan, karagu. Madalla da sakamakonsu. Kuma Aljanna ta kyautatu da zama wurin hutawa
